title: The Legend of Hanuman
language: Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Marathi, Bengali, Malayalam, Kannada
description: An animated series depicting the epic tale of Hanuman, from his childhood to his pivotal role in the Ramayana.

title: Mahabharat
description: A contemporary retelling of the great Indian epic Mahabharata, focusing on the conflict between the Pandavas and the Kauravas.

title: Sarabhai V/S Sarabhai
description: A classic comedy series that hilariously portrays the cultural clashes and humorous dynamics between a sophisticated South Delhi family and their middle-class daughter-in-law.

title: Special Ops
description: A gripping action thriller series following Himmat Singh of RAW as he connects a series of terror attacks and embarks on a multi-year manhunt for the mastermind.

title: Criminal Justice
description: An engaging crime thriller anthology series where each season follows a unique criminal case and the journey through the legal system.

title: The Freelancer
description: A high-stakes action thriller series about a former mercenary who takes on a perilous mission to rescue a young woman held captive in a war-torn region.

title: The Freelancer
description: A high-stakes action thriller series about a former mercenary who takes on a perilous mission to rescue a young woman held captive in a war-torn region.
